kariminf.as.process.extraction.bayes

Interface Feature

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PLeng, Pos, RLeng, TFB, TFU

    public interface Feature
    The feature to be used to score a sentence in the text.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getScoreParam()
      Gets the names of parameters separated by a comma
      java.lang.String getTrainParam()
      Gets the names of parameters separated by a comma.
      java.lang.Double score(int classID, java.util.List<java.lang.Object> scoreParam)
      Scores a sentence according to a topic.
      void train(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> trainParam)
      Trains the classifier using to this feature

    • Method Detail

      • getTrainParam

        java.lang.String getTrainParam()
        Gets the names of parameters separated by a comma.
        Returns:
        training parameters' names

      • train

        void train(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> trainParam)
        Trains the classifier using to this feature
        Parameters:
        trainParam - a list of objects which are the parameters needed by this feature for training.

      • getScoreParam

        java.lang.String getScoreParam()
        Gets the names of parameters separated by a comma
        Returns:
        score parameters' names

      • score

        java.lang.Double score(int classID,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.Object> scoreParam)
        Scores a sentence according to a topic. The sentence is scored using the score parameters, for example, the term frequency.
        Parameters:
        classID - the ID of the class (topic) wich is used to score the sentence
        scoreParam - a list of Objects which are the parameters needed to score the sentence
        Returns:
        the score of the sentence in the class "classID" using this feature
